title: Can climate change cause more disease?
description: With warming temperatures, mosquitos are now spreading to new areas, including Europe.

vocabItems.definition: physical signs of the presence of an illness or disease in your body
medical condition in which your body temperature is higher than normal, and your heart beats very fast
limited period of time during which action must be taken to achieve a desired result
plant or animal that another plant or animal lives on as a parasite, or uses for food
a part of a complicated or continuing situation that helps you to understand it
situation in which something, usually bad, happens, causing further negative events to happen
